property.name: Size
property.description-key: Select the size of the risk matrix display

value.name: Small
value.description-key: Compact size suitable for narrow forms

value.name: Large
value.description-key: Large size, suitable for wide forms and detailed views

property.name: ShowCategoryLabels
property.description-key: Show or hide the category labels (Low, Medium, High, Critical)

property.name: ShowAxisLabels
property.description-key: Show or hide the axis labels (Impact and Probability)

property.name: GridSize
property.description-key: Select the number of categories for the risk matrix grid

property.name: ImpactLabel
property.description-key: Custom label for the impact axis

property.name: ProbabilityLabel
property.description-key: Custom label for the probability axis

property.name: ShowRiskLabel
property.description-key: Show the current risk level above the matrix

property.name: LowColor
property.description-key: Hex color for low risk areas

property.name: MediumColor
property.description-key: Hex color for medium risk areas

property.name: HighColor
property.description-key: Hex color for high risk areas

property.name: CriticalColor
property.description-key: Hex color for critical risk areas
